document_data.name: Davien Mecatoris
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Davien Mecatoris''' was the scion of [[House Mecatoris]] of [[Sambral]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|8}}
document_data.Relationships: Davien was the son of Lady [[Althea Mecatoris]].
document_data.Activities: Davien was the leader of [[Flashing Blade at Dusk Troupe]], a troupe of vigilantes that patrolled the city of Sambral.
document_data.History:
Some time before 1479 DR, Davien converted to the faith of [[Tempus]].

In 1479 DR, Davien was kidnapped by the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] and sacrificed to the [[primordial]] [[Achazar]]. He survived the experience, however, and was rescued by Sambral's authorities.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|45}}
